name: Atop a Snowy Peak
description:
A Quarter-Hour Quest of snow and solitude for one player.

Yuki awakes alone atop a mountain…changed, with her skin now white as snow. Your actions determine how she'll spend the rest of her existence Atop a Snowy Peak.

Quarter-Hour Quests are short games that can be played through in 15 minutes. Drawing inspiration from short stories, computer role-playing games, and art games, they provide bite-sized gameplay for about the cost of a cup of coffee or short story.
